title: Anchorages.co
description:
A live ranking of your favorite ports and anchorages in the Mediterranean and Caribbean seas. Zoom-in to avoid seaweed fields, keeping an eye on the tide and weather forecast. Read sailors’ notes and warnings, share your best photos, or join a sailing group for the local news.
With a clean interface and a wealth of features, Anchorages.co serves as a robust tool for both seasoned sailors and newcomers to the cruising lifestyle.
